metadata.title: CVE-2016-5029 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The create_fullest_file_path function in libdwarf before 20160923 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference)via a crafted dwarf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5029` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507+git20160523.9086738-1').
